resources.string: To improve your experience in this application, we recommend that you waste a part of your time to make this form so that in the future, we can offer you the best book recommendations. This form is not mandatory.
First, you must select the genres of books that interest you.
Second, you must select the books that you have read.
Finally, you must select the books that you are interested.
Finally, we have correctly configured your library and have optimized your searches based on the options that you have chosen. These options can be modified in the future if you wish.
To start using the application, press "done" for the changes to take effect.
